result.reason: RDP sessions inside mRemoteNG ignore host DPI scaling factor (always 100%) despite app-level PerMonitorV2 awareness being set — the MSTSCLib ActiveX control needs explicit DPI scale propagation
result.approach: Detect current monitor DPI scale factor and pass it to the MSTSCLib RDP ActiveX control (DesktopScaleFactor/DeviceScaleFactor properties available in MsRdpClient9+) so embedded RDP sessions match the host display scaling
